description: Try our easy to follow Mini Chicken Tikka Tortillas With Yoghurt, Cucumber, & Mint Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Chicken Tikka Tortillas With Yoghurt, Cucumber, & Mint Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g cooked chicken tikka pieces, chopped into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dip, tip the yoghurt into a bowl. Finely dice the cucumber, and add to the yoghurt with the mint leaves. Season well with salt and black pepper. Taste, and season more if needed.
Tip the corn chips onto a clean surface, and spread out in a single layer. Add a teaspoon of mango chutney to each one.
Add some chicken pieces to each corn chip. Spoon on about a teaspoon of the dip, and garnish with coriander. Serve immediately.
